alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Montgomery, southwestern Randolph and northeastern Stanly Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Badin Lake, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Badin Lake, Biscoe, Badin, Star, Richfield, New London, Steeds, Eldorado and Fish Tales Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Boaters on the open water and those camping outdoors are especially vulnerable to the dangers of lightning. Seek harbor immediately and find safe shelter in a nearby building or vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
